question: A bunch of my sister's hair were pulled violently off her head by a criminal. However upon medical examination there was no blood stains on the exposed scalp. The medical exam was performed within a couple of hours of the incident. The medical examiner concluded that injury was not recent????? My sister is 60 yrs old, is suffering from Chronic Renal failure, diabetes and hypertension and is on several medications for these ailments.Is the conclusion of the medical examiner valid? The criminal got away because of this conclusion.Thanks a lotAnuj
title: Head hair pulled violently but no blood
